లలితా సహస్రనామం త్రిరాత్ర ఉపవాసదీక్ష: Lalita Sahasrnaamam – Triraatra Upavaasa Deeksha

    While doing triratra upavasa deeksha can It be recited outside I mean in office.or in temple specially in the afternon kindly inform

  2. narmada
    December 17, 2015

    Leave a Reply

    Guruvu gari pada padmalku namaskaramulu
    Nenu ma ammai santhanam kosam triratri vratham cheyali ani anukuntunnanu .emi anusamputi cheyali.vari iruvu nakastralu sathabisham abbaildi .vishaka ammaidi.

  3. kamala

    Leave a Reply

    Guruvugariki namaskaram
    Nenu lalitha sahasranama stotram 100 times chadivanu 3months nunchi.Ma ammayi job kosam emi anusamputi cheyali.Swathi Nakshatram.
